cu.explanation_en: Setting local_s_portc to 99999 (exceeds maximum port number) will cause network configuration errors and prevent F1 interface setup.

du.explanation_en: Setting ssb_perRACH_OccasionAndCB_PreamblesPerSSB_PR to 10 (invalid value, valid range 1-8) will cause configuration validation failure and prevent SSB/RACH setup.
du.explanation_zh: 將 ssb_perRACH_OccasionAndCB_PreamblesPerSSB_PR 設定為 10（無效值，有效範圍 1-8）會導致配置驗證失敗，並阻止 SSB/RACH 設定。
